events: Create scaleable applications 'n toolin' fer account management that handles peaks o' 1 million users a day 'n 200 thousand users per hour.
Setup threat detection, monitorin', 'n loggin'. Ensurin' stability o' Account Platform applications by reducin' false positive errors 'n alertin' developers early o' production issues.
Design financial toolin' t' integrate 3rd party bounty offerings t' increase deposits t' DraftKings by 10%.
Implemented a crew-wide internal code coverage tool that gives developers a holistic view o' thar code coverage. This led t' better overall testin' 'n less redundant test cases.
Created 'n maintained core applications fer FactSet's Research Business Unit. These apps provided real-time news, events, 'n signals t' both Buy Side 'n Sell Side clients.
Managed an agile crew t' create stable 'n shareable UI components t' improve sustainability across multiple FactSet applications.
Designed API endpoints t' fetch news 'n events fer internal 'n external clients.
Migrated legacy code from Angular.js t' Vue.js, increasin' unit test coverage by utilizin' Typescript o'er Javascript, 'n creatin' responsive applications.
